amendment.description: To provide for Congressional notification of cancellation of major automated information systems.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2462 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2462 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Vitter. (consideration: CR S12497-12513; text: CR S12509) To provide for Congressional notification of cancellation of major automated information systems.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2462 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2462 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Vitter.
